title: Provide a shields.io badge
body:
### Describe the feature you would like

It would be nice to offer a [shields.io](https://shields.io) badge for Foundry, which would contain the logo currently found in the README:

![foundry-logo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8782666/174073841-c4382c81-72b2-48fe-aff6-f90b3cbd3c66.png)

This would make it easier for devoted users to signal their allegiance to Foundry in their project READMEs.

https://github.com/sambacha/foundry-badge - can submit the badge to [simpleicons repo ](https://simpleicons.org/) and have the foundry logo embedded similar to ethereum/solidity logo. however it may have too much detail and not downsize appropriately 

Here are some examples

The `use template` button when clicked will take you to generating a new repo from the template repo

Unfortunately TOML isn't a format that shields offers parsing abilities for, only yaml / json and ... xml.
